name: Illusion (itch) (Kulurc)
description:
Play as a noble knight on a quest to defeat the sorceress terrorizing a small village. Be careful, not everything is real...

 Defeat Illusions! Uncover secret paths! Face the Illusionist!

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Attack - Mouse 1
  • Illusion Vision - Mouse 2
  • Interact - E
  • Roll - Left Shift
  • Pause - Escape
  • Aim the projectiles using your mouse

Made within 1 week for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
